title: Wagyu Chimichurri Rolls
description: Thin slices of Argentine Wagyu beef wrapped around sushi rice, avocado, and scallions, drizzled with house-made chimichurri soy glaze.

title: Empanadas Nippon
description: Traditional empanadas filled with miso-glazed pork, shiitake mushrooms, and scallions, served with a wasabi-lime aioli.

title: Gaucho Ramen
description: A bold miso broth infused with smoked paprika and grilled chorizo, topped with soft-boiled egg, nori, and tender asado beef strips.

title: Tuna Tartar Criollo
description: Fresh diced tuna sashimi tossed with yuzu, olive oil, red pepper, and chimichurri herbs, served on crispy rice crackers.

title: Teriyaki Milanesa
description: Panko-breaded beef cutlet in a sweet teriyaki reduction, garnished with sesame seeds and green onions, served with wasabi mashed potatoes.

title: Pampas Sushi Platter
description: Sushi assortment featuring grilled provoleta nigiri, flank steak maki with pickled onions, and tempura mollejas (sweetbreads).

title: Mate & Matcha Cheesecake
description: Creamy layered cheesecake flavored with Argentine yerba mate and Japanese matcha, on a sesame-almond crust.

title: Tempura Humita Bites
description: Corn and cheese humita fritters given a Japanese tempura twist, served with spicy soy aioli.

title: Yakitori al Malbec
description: Skewered chicken glazed with a Malbec-teriyaki reduction, grilled and finished with smoked salt and a dash of lime.

title: Sashimi Criollo Bowl
description: A poke-style bowl with salmon sashimi, roasted peppers, pickled eggplant, and sushi rice, finished with chimichurri dressing and crispy onions.
